topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554838c4636872151bf10100#post_554838c4636872151bf10100
I find Punisher pretty enjoyable in a ridiculous, edgelord sort of way. I mean his stories have to be taken with a healthy dose of irony and self awareness that what you are enjoying is badwrongfun.

For instance, Ennis's run on Punisher MAX is highly enjoyable if you can get in the appropriate fourteen year old boy headspace.

However whenever any of this touches the greater Marvel universe I get annoyed. Just once I'd like to see a comic where he shows up and Peter Parker just fucking wrecks his shit.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

Honestly my favorite parody of the Punisher ever was in the first episode of the Tick where its a guy with a shit load of guns who basically breaks down crying and asks why his mommy didn't love him.
